title: cTrader Web | ctrader Platform Brokers | IC Markets
meta: IC Markets provides cTrader Web that offers the ultra fast order execution capabilities of cTrader with ease and convenience of being a web based application.
ctrader_web_2: Access your cTrader account from anywhere in the world using cTrader’s ultra-responsive web interface. Flawlessly execute your trades on cTrader web without any downloads or installations.
ctrader_web_18: cTrader Web offers the ultra fast order execution capabilities of cTrader with the ease and convenience of being a web-based application. cTrader Web is a user friendly web-based trading platform allowing you to enjoy trading in a True ECN environment from anywhere in the world.
ctrader_web_19: cTrader Web has the same market leading spreads, Level II Pricing, and one-click trading as the cTrader desktop version along with features such as a personalized trader dashboard to allow monitoring of your positions at a glance.
ctrader_web_21: Browsers Supported: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE 9+
ctrader_web_22: Trade Forex from anywhere on cTrader Web!
ctrader_web_25: Take advantage of our True ECN spreads
ctrader_web_27: Trade micro lots 0.01 with no maximum
ctrader_web_28: Level II pricing – full market depth
ctrader_web_35: Trade against the market with no dealing desk intervention
ctrader_web_36: Save money every time you trade with our low costs
ctrader_web_37: Enjoy the fastest ultra low latency execution possible
ctrader_web_39: Have greater control over your risk with micro lots
ctrader_web_40: Move money in and out of your trading account with ease
ctrader_web_42: Use the same account on cTrader and cTrader Web
ctrader_web_44: English, Russian, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Polish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Italian, Greek, Turkish, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Arabic and German
